nodes.text: The Guuko system was a star system located in the Weneen sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Outer Rim Territories and the New Territories. It was the origin point of the group known as Guukosi as well as the Guuko Pure Light party.
The Guuko system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square N-6.
